alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GARFIELD... SOUTHEASTERN HOLT AND NORTHWESTERN WHEELER COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Chambers, or 23 miles northeast of Burwell, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chambers around 455 PM CDT. Page around 520 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Sunfish Lake, Inman, and Gables. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 306 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 153 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Nebraska.
